mapper.select: select A.id, A.date, A.driverId, A.driverName, A.vehicleId, A.plateNum, A.routeName, A.dispatchTime, A.scheduleTime, A.departureTime, A.arrivalTime, A.status, A.starttag, A.siteName, A.late, A.trip, A.comsuTime, B.selfNum, B.swipeCode, A.spacing, A.mileage, A.isThroughUpMonitorSite, A.isThroughDownMonitorSite, A.whetherSwipeDeparture, A.hasNextWorkplan from dispatch.workplan A left join dispatch.vehicle B on A.vehicleId = B.vehicleId where 1=1 and (A.`status`<'3' or A.`status` is null ) and A.driverId = #{driverId} and A.date = #{date} order by A.scheduleTime
select id, from dispatch.workplan where id=#{value}

SELECT A.vehicleId, A.plateNum, A.routeName, A.selfNum FROM vehicle A RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT vehicleId, plateNum FROM workplan WHERE routeName=#{routeName} and date=#{date} GROUP BY vehicleId,plateNum ) B ON A.vehicleId = B.vehicleId

select A.driverName, A.plateNum, A.routeName, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.departureTime),'%H:%i:%S') as departureString, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.arrivalTime),'%H:%i:%S') as arrivalString, A.status, A.starttag, A.departureWay, A.arrivalWay, B.selfNum, A.isThroughUpMonitorSite from dispatch.workplan A left join vehicle B on A.vehicleId = B.vehicleId where A.status in ('1','2')
AND A.isThroughUpMonitorSite = 1
and A.routeName=#{routeName} and A.date=#{date} order by A.scheduleTime
